body:
Helm plugin downloader functionality doesn't currently support sub-commands. This limits how plugin writers can structure their programs. It also makes it incompatible with argument parsing libraries like kingpin since you can't mix top level arguments with other sub-commands. Helm should parse the command in plugin.yaml and split the command by spaces and add the parsed sub-commands to the args. Incoming PR to do exactly this.

```yaml
name: "example"
version: "0.1.0"
usage: "Example"
description: |-
  Example
command: "$HELM_PLUGIN_DIR/helm-example"
downloaders:
- command: "helm-example download"
  protocols:
  - "git"
```
Expected:
```
steven-macbook:~/go/src/k8s.io/helm/bin$ ./helm repo update --debug
Hang tight while we grab the latest from your chart repositories...
...Successfully got an update from the "example" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "stable" chart repository
```

Actual:
```
helm repo update --debug
Hang tight while we grab the latest from your chart repositories...
...Unable to get an update from the "example" chart repository (git://git@github.com:steven-sheehy/helm.git):
	fork/exec /Users/steven-sheehy/.helm/plugins/helm-example/helm-example download: no such file or directory
...Successfully got an update from the "stable" chart repository
```

Output of `helm version`: 
```
Client: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.12.3", GitCommit:"eecf22f77df5f65c823aacd2dbd30ae6c65f186e", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Server: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.12.3", GitCommit:"eecf22f77df5f65c823aacd2dbd30ae6c65f186e", GitTreeState:"clean"}
```

Output of `kubectl version`:
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11", GitVersion:"v1.11.6", GitCommit:"b1d75deca493a24a2f87eb1efde1a569e52fc8d9", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-12-16T04:39:52Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11", GitVersion:"v1.11.6", GitCommit:"b1d75deca493a24a2f87eb1efde1a569e52fc8d9", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-12-16T04:30:10Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

title: Helm plugin downloader should accept sub-commands
